name: 鄭孟淙
objective:
課程講解新產品開發流程的企畫、設計、製造等知識外，演練解決複雜的產品設計開發問題之系統化設計方法，延續並運用大一與大二課程所學之美學、人因工程、工學、電腦繪圖等各方面知識與技能。課程將以聯合國可持續發展目標（SDGs）和大學社會責任（USR）之議題，培養學生在設計過程中考量產品的社會影響。學生可將他們的設計應用於合作項目，直接回應產業及社會需求，體驗專業技能對社會產生正面影響的過程。
This course goes beyond teaching the knowledge of planning, designing, and manufacturing in the new product development process. It involves practicing systematic design methods to solve complex product design and development issues, continuing and utilizing the knowledge and skills learned in aesthetics, ergonomics, engineering, and computer-aided drawing from freshman and sophomore courses. The course is structured around the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) and University Social Responsibility (USR) initiatives, aiming to cultivate students' consideration of the social impact of products during the design process. Students will have the opportunity to apply their designs in collaborative projects, directly responding to industry and societal needs, and experiencing the positive impact their professional skills can have on society.
